Feature.Name: PaymentWalletsFeature
Feature.Description: In order to manage the Payment Wallet As an api service I want to be able to deposit, withdraw and get current balance

Scenario.Name: Scenario 1 Perform payment wallet actions negative path

Name.Format: Scenario 1 Perform payment wallet actions negative path

Label.Name: SCENARIO 2 - Perform Payment Wallet Actions Negative Path

Step.Name: SETUP A clean up on the payment wallet is requested before test commence

StepName.Format: A clean up on the payment wallet is requested before test commence

SubStep.Name: WHEN A get wallet balance action is requested

StepName.Format: A get wallet balance action is requested

SubStep.Name: AND A withdraw amount all amount action is requested

StepName.Format: A withdraw amount all amount action is requested

Step.Name: GIVEN A withdraw amount action that exceeds the wallet balance is requested and return message should be "Invalid withdrawal amount. There are insufficient funds." [paymentWithdrawInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentWithdrawInput"]

StepName.Format: A withdraw amount action that exceeds the wallet balance is requested and return message should be "{1}" [paymentWithdrawInput: "{0}"]
StepName.Parameter: Invalid withdrawal amount. There are insufficient funds.

Step.Name: WHEN A deposit amount action is requested [paymentDepositInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentDepositInput"]

StepName.Format: A deposit amount action is requested [paymentDepositInput: "{0}"]

Step.Name: THEN A withdraw amount action that exceeds the wallet balance is requested and return message should be "Invalid withdrawal amount. There are insufficient funds." [paymentWithdrawInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentWithdrawInput"]

StepName.Format: A withdraw amount action that exceeds the wallet balance is requested and return message should be "{1}" [paymentWithdrawInput: "{0}"]
StepName.Parameter: Invalid withdrawal amount. There are insufficient funds.

Step.Name: AND A get wallet balance action is requested

StepName.Format: A get wallet balance action is requested

Step.Name: AND The wallet balance should be set to amount "300"

StepName.Format: The wallet balance should be set to amount "{0}"

Step.Name: AND A deposit amount action with an invalid is requested and return message should be "One or more validation errors occurred." [paymentDepositInput: "Payment.Wallet.Contracts.PaymentDepositInput"]

StepName.Format: A deposit amount action with an invalid is requested and return message should be "{1}" [paymentDepositInput: "{0}"]
StepName.Parameter: One or more validation errors occurred.
